text:
A radio button in "HTTP Request" to disable "HTTP Request Defaults" on a per
request basis

This has arisen due to a POST request of mine which is broken by the defaults
which need to be defined in the Path in this case.
creator: stuart.findlay@cp.net

text:
The reason mentionned for this improvement is not valid as path defined in sampler will take precedence on default.
Does not seem useful to me .
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
